description:
A runner saves a group of monkeys at an expensive cost, the Sun, Moon, and Thunder come to an agreement, and a Woodcutter gets the last laugh.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Monkey Masamune / The Days Pass So Fast / The Woodcutter & the Mountain Grannie
Saru Masamune / Tsukihi no Tatsu no wa Hayai / Kikori to Yamanba
猿正宗 / 月日のたつのは早い / きこりと山姥
